EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_ Ensuring Cloud Native Success: The Greenfield Journey_Q415.Follo
EmailTemplate.subject: Going Green - Ensuring Cloud Native Success Webinar Replay
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
We’re sorry you were unable to join us yesterday. Coté tackled the first installment, The Greenfield Journey <http://pivotal.io/platform/webinar/ensuring-cloud-native-success-the-greenfield-journey>, of our 3 part Cloud Native Journey series. During Ensuring Cloud Native Success: The Greenfield Journey, we reviewed the top goals and strategies that can help companies and teams deploy greenfield projects:
- Earn trust by showing success - Establish a continuous delivery pipeline and cloud platform - Learn by doing and educate the rest of the organization
Check out the replay <http://pivotal.io/platform/webinar/ensuring-cloud-native-success-the-greenfield-journey> and slides <http://www.slideshare.net/Pivotal/ensuring-cloud-native-success-the-greenfield-journey-54828545> and don't forget to register to join Coté and team for Part 2 <http://pivotal.io/platform/webinar/ensuring-cloud-native-success-working-with-legacy-it> & Part 3 <http://pivotal.io/platform/webinar/ensuring-cloud-native-success-organization-transformation> coming in December.
The Pivotal Team
